name: Geek Bar Pulse X | 25,000 Puffs Disposable Vape with 3D Curved Screen
description:
The Geek Bar Pulse X is a high-performance, long-lasting disposable vape designed for users who want a balance of massive puff counts and cutting-edge technology. Featuring the world's first 3D curved screen, this device provides a visually stunning interface that displays your battery life, e-liquid levels, and puffing mode in real-time.

Key Features
Dual Vaping Modes:

Regular Mode: Offers up to 25,000 puffs for maximum longevity and consistent flavor.

Pulse Mode: Boosts power for more intense flavor and larger clouds, offering up to 15,000 puffs.

3D Curved Display: A vibrant, wrap-around screen with starry constellation animations and clear digital indicators for battery and juice levels.

Advanced Dual Mesh Coil: Ensures even heating and prevents burnt hits, maintaining flavor quality from the first puff to the last.

High Nicotine Strength: Contains 5% (50mg/mL) nicotine for a smooth yet satisfying throat hit.

Fast Charging: Equipped with a rechargeable battery (USB-C) to ensure you can use every drop of e-liquid.

Available Flavors Shown
Watermelon Ice: A refreshing blend of sweet watermelon with a crisp menthol finish.

Wild Cherry Slush: A nostalgic, icy treat featuring bold, tart cherry notes.

Sour Fucking Fab: A complex, tangy fruit medley for those who love a sour kick.

name: Geek Bar Pulse 15,000 | The World’s First Full-Screen Disposable Vape
description:
The Geek Bar Pulse 15,000 is the groundbreaking original model that introduced the 'Smart Screen' to the vaping world. It is a dual-mode disposable device designed for vapers who want a futuristic look combined with the ability to switch between a long-lasting standard experience and a powerful 'Pulse' boost.

Key Features
Dual-Core & Dual-Mesh Coil: Features two mesh coils that work together to deliver consistent flavor and massive vapor, even when the battery is low.

Full-Screen Display: A vibrant side-screen that clearly shows your Battery Percentage and E-liquid Levels, so you never get a dry hit unexpectedly.

Adjustable Vaping Modes:

Regular Mode (15,000 Puffs): Uses a single coil in an alternating fashion to provide a smooth, long-lasting experience.

Pulse Mode (7,500 Puffs): Activates both coils and increases the wattage (up to 20W) for 200% more vapor and enhanced flavor intensity.

Space Capsule Design: A sleek, transparent exterior inspired by futuristic space technology with cosmic-themed animations on the screen.

Bite-Friendly Mouthpiece: A transparent, moderate-hardness shell that improves comfort and hygiene.

name: Geek Bar Cyber Tank | 40,000 Puffs Disposable Vape
description:
The Geek Bar Cyber Tank is a high-capacity, ruggedized disposable vape designed for ultimate longevity and performance. Inspired by futuristic 'cyber' aesthetics, it features a heavy-duty casing and a massive e-liquid reservoir that delivers up to 40,000 puffs in its most efficient mode. This device is powered by an advanced triple-mesh coil system and a high-performance smart chip, ensuring that flavor quality remains consistent even as the juice level decreases.

Key Features
Massive Puff Capacity: Delivers up to 40,000 puffs in Eco Mode, making it one of the longest-lasting disposables on the market.

Triple-Mesh Coil Technology: Utilizes three mesh coils to maximize surface area, resulting in richer flavor and denser vapor production compared to standard dual-mesh devices.

Dual or Triple Power Modes:

Eco Mode: Maximizes longevity for the full 40,000 puff experience.

Normal/Pulse Mode: Increases wattage for a more intense hit, reducing the total puff count but significantly boosting flavor and cloud size.

Cyber Smart Screen: A large, clear display that provides real-time monitoring of battery percentage, e-liquid levels, and the currently active vaping mode.

Rugged Design: Built with high-durability materials to withstand daily wear and tear, featuring a 'tank-like' aesthetic.

name: Cali UL80,000 | 80,000 Puffs Smart Disposable Vape
description:
The Cali UL80000 is a sleek and technologically advanced disposable vape pen from Cali Pods, designed to provide an extended and high-quality vaping experience. It features an integrated LED display screen that offers real-time monitoring of both your battery life and e-liquid levels, ensuring you are never caught off guard. Designed for comfort, it includes a soft silicone tip and a slim, portable profile that fits easily in a pocket or bag.

Key Features
Massive Puff Count: Delivers approximately 8,000 puffs per device.

Smart LED Display: Clearly shows remaining battery percentage and e-liquid levels.

Advanced Mesh Coil: Uses mesh coil technology to ensure a consistent, smooth, and flavorful draw from the first puff to the last.

Comfort Design: Features a unique silicone mouthpiece for added comfort during use.

Rechargeable Battery: Equipped with a 600mAh to 650mAh battery that supports convenient Type-C USB fast charging.

name: RAZ DC15000 Disposable Vape | 15,000 Puffs (Boost) | Mega HD Screen
description:
Experience the Future of Vaping with the RAZ DC15000 (Boost). Elevate your vaping journey with a powerhouse device built for flavor lovers who want intense performance. Wrapped in premium genuine leather, it feels as luxurious as it performs.

Puff Capacity
- 15,000 Puffs (Boost Mode): Unleash maximum flavor and massive vapor clouds with enhanced power.

Innovative Mega HD Screen
- E-Liquid Indicator: Know exactly how much juice is left.
- Battery Life Monitor: Track your 800mAh battery at a glance.
- Vaping Animations: High-quality fire and gear animations while you puff.

Key Features
- Pre-filled E-liquid for long-lasting use
- Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
- Advanced Mesh Coil for pure, "bangin" flavor
- USB-C Fast Charging (cable not included)
- Premium transparent shell with textured leather finish

Available Flavors
- Bangin Sour Berries
- Miami Mint
- Blueberry Watermelon
- Wintergreen

name: RAZ DC25000 Disposable Vape | 25,000 Puffs (Normal) | Mega HD Screen
description:
Experience the Future of Vaping with the RAZ DC25000 (Normal). Designed for longevity and consistency, this device is perfect for everyday vapers who want smooth, reliable draws for weeks. Wrapped in premium genuine leather for a luxury feel.

Puff Capacity
- 25,000 Puffs (Normal Mode): Smooth, consistent performance built to last.

Innovative Mega HD Screen
- E-Liquid Indicator: Stay aware and avoid dry hits.
- Battery Life Monitor: Track your 800mAh battery level.
- Vaping Animations: Dynamic fire and gear animations while you puff.

Key Features
- Pre-filled E-liquid for long-lasting use
- Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
- Advanced Mesh Coil for pure, "bangin" flavor
- USB-C Fast Charging (cable not included)
- Premium transparent shell with textured leather finish

Available Flavors
- Bangin Sour Berries
- Miami Mint
- Blueberry Watermelon
- Wintergreen

name: Air Bar AURA XL Disposable Vape | 30,000 Puffs | Mega HD Display & PTC Chip
description:
The Ultimate Vaping Experience: Air Bar AURA XL The Air Bar AURA XL is a next-generation disposable device designed for vapers who prioritize both longevity and cutting-edge technology. Featuring a massive 27mL pre-filled e-liquid capacity and an advanced 800mAh rechargeable battery, this device is built to last through thousands of satisfying draws.

Intelligent Features & Display
Stay informed with the built-in XL HD screen, which provides real-time monitoring of your essential stats:

- E-Liquid Level Indicator: Easily track how much juice remains.

- Battery Monitoring: Know exactly when it's time to recharge via the USB-C port.

- Dynamic Animations: Interactive visuals engage every time you take a puff.

Customizable Performance
Dual Vaping Modes: Choose between Regular Mode for maximum longevity (up to 25,000 puffs) or switch to a more intense experience.

Adjustable Airflow: Fine-tune your draw from a tight MTL (mouth-to-lung) to a more open, restricted DTL (direct-to-lung) hit.

Advanced PTC Chip: Integrated technology ensures consistent flavor and performance while preventing overheating.

Product Specifications:
- Puff Count: Up to 25,000 Puffs.
- E-Liquid Capacity: 27mL.
- Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg).
- Coil System: High-performance Mesh Coil for rich, pure flavor.
- Charging: Type-C Fast Charging.

Top Flavors in this Lineup:
- Sour Apple Ice: A tart apple blast with a cooling menthol finish.
- Miami Mint: Crisp, refreshing, and smooth spearmint.
- Blueberry Ice: Sweet mountain blueberries with a chilled exhale.

name: Fooger 30,000 Puff Limited Edition Disposable | Mega HD Screen | Dual Power Modes
description:
Push the Boundaries of Vaping with the RAZ LTX 30,000 The RAZ LTX 30,000 is the pinnacle of disposable technology, engineered for vapers who never want to run out of flavor. This massive-capacity device combines a sophisticated genuine leather grip with a futuristic Mega HD Screen, providing a premium feel and total control over your vaping experience.

The Largest HD Screen in the Game
Stay ahead of the curve with a full-color, high-definition interface that does more than just show numbers. The Mega HD Screen features:

Dynamic Fire Animations: Visual flames and gears that react to every draw.

Real-Time Monitoring: Keep a precise eye on your remaining E-liquid and Battery Life.

Mode Indicators: Easily see if you are in high-power "Boost" mode or long-lasting "Normal" mode.

Advanced Performance Features
30,000 Puff Capacity: Optimized for longevity, providing weeks of use in Normal Mode.

Enhanced Boost Mode: Switch to Boost for intensified flavor and massive vapor production (approx. 18,000 puffs).

Premium Mesh Coil Technology: Dual mesh coils ensure that the last puff tastes as fresh and vibrant as the first.

USB-C Fast Charging: Minimize downtime with rapid recharging for the integrated 800mAh battery.

Specifications at a Glance:
Max Puffs: 30,000 (Normal Mode)
Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)
Charging: Type-C Rechargeable
Finish: Transparent shell with Genuine Leather accents
Display: Full HD Smart Screen

Featured Flavors:
Miami Mint: A chillingly smooth and refreshing mint.
Bangin Sour Berries: A sharp, tangy explosion of mixed berry goodness.
Blueberry Watermelon: A sweet, juicy fusion of summer favorites.
Watermelon Ice: Crisp watermelon with a freezing menthol finish.

name: tyson 30000 Disposable Vape | 30K Puffs | Mega HD Animated Screen | Premium Leather Grip
description:
Experience the Evolution of Vaping: The 30,000 Puff Titan
Step into the future with the longest-lasting disposable vape on the market. Engineered for those who demand performance, style, and longevity, the RAZ LTX 30000 combines a massive e-liquid reservoir with industry-leading smart technology. Wrapped in a premium genuine leather grip, it offers a luxurious feel that matches its powerful performance.

Dual-Mode Performance
Customize your hit with a simple toggle:

Normal Mode (30,000 Puffs): Optimized for consistent, smooth flavor and maximum longevity.

Boost Mode (18,000 Puffs): Activates dual mesh coils for intensified flavor and massive vapor production.

Mega HD Animated Display
The largest screen ever seen on a disposable! This high-definition interface provides more than just data; it provides an experience:

Vape Animations: Stunning HD graphics that change while you puff.

Juice & Battery Levels: Never guess your remaining levels again with precise percentage tracking.

Charging Status: Real-time feedback when plugged into a USB-C fast charger.

Key Specifications
Puff Count: Up to 30,000 Puffs (Normal Mode) / 18,000 Puffs (Boost Mode)

E-Liquid Capacity: Extra-Large Reservoir

Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg)

Battery: 800mAh High-Density Rechargeable

Coil System: Advanced Dual Mesh Coil for superior flavor clarity

Charging: Type-C Fast Charge Port

Available Premium Flavors
Bangin Sour Berries: A sharp, tart mix of wild forest berries.

Miami Mint: A crisp, refreshing, and icy spearmint.

Blueberry Watermelon: The perfect balance of sweet summer fruits.

Wintergreen: A bold, cool blast of classic wintergreen freshness.

name: Tyson 25000 Disposable Vape | 15,000 Puffs (Boost Mode) | Mega HD Screen | Genuine Leather Grip
description:
Unlock Maximum Power with the Tyson 25000 Boost Edition The RAZ DC25000 is a premium, high-performance disposable vape designed for those who refuse to compromise on flavor intensity. Featuring a luxurious genuine leather wrap and a transparent outer shell, this device offers a sophisticated aesthetic alongside cutting-edge technology.

Optimized for 15,000 Puffs of Pure Flavor
While this device can reach 25,000 puffs in Regular Mode, the Boost Mode is where it truly shines. By switching to Boost (24W), the device activates its enhanced dual-core technology to deliver:

Rich Flavor: 15,000 puffs of intensified, bold taste.

Dense Vapor: Maximum cloud production for a satisfying hit every time.

Advanced Mesh Coils: Integrated 1.0Ω mesh coil technology ensures a smooth and consistent draw.

Mega HD Smart Screen
Stay informed with the industry-leading 1.77-inch HD display. This interactive screen provides real-time updates and stylish visuals, including:

E-Liquid Level Indicator: Know exactly when your 16mL reservoir is running low.

Battery Life Monitor: Track the 800mAh battery for timely recharging via USB-C.

Dynamic Animations: High-quality graphics like fire and gear animations that activate as you vape.

Key Specifications
Puff Count: 15,000 Puffs (Boost Mode) / 25,000 Puffs (Regular Mode).

Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg) salt nicotine for a perfect throat hit.

Modes: One-click toggle between Light and Dark display modes.

Airflow: Stepless adjustable airflow control on the bottom of the device.

Battery: 800mAh rechargeable (USB-C port).

Popular Flavors Shown:
Bangin Sour Berries: A sharp, tangy berry explosion.

Miami Mint: A crisp, tropical-inspired cool mint.

Blueberry Watermelon: A juicy, sweet fruit fusion.

name: Airbar 5000 / LTX Edition Disposable Vape (15,000–25,000 Puffs)
description:
The Ultimate Luxury Vaping Experience: RAZ DC25000 Redefine your vaping journey with the RAZ DC25000, a high-performance disposable that merges cutting-edge technology with premium design. Encased in a genuine leather-wrapped grip and a transparent protective shell, this device feels as good as it performs.

Dual Vaping Modes for Precision Control
Toggle between two distinct power settings with a single click to match your mood:

Boost Mode (15,000 Puffs): Operates at 24 watts for intensified flavor and massive vapor clouds.

Regular Mode (25,000 Puffs): Operates at 12 watts for a smoother, consistent draw that lasts for weeks.

Industry-Leading Mega HD Screen
Stay fully informed with the 1.77-inch Mega HD smart screen, the largest in its class. The vibrant interface includes:

E-Liquid & Battery Indicators: Precise percentage tracking so you never run out unexpectedly.

Vaping Animations: Interactive "Fire" and "Gear" animations that play while you draw.

Display Customization: Choose between Light and Dark modes to suit your environment.

Key Performance Features
Advanced Mesh Coils: Features temperature-controlled dual-mesh technology for pure flavor and zero burnt hits.

Adjustable Airflow: A stepless airflow control valve on the base allows you to fine-tune your draw from a tight MTL to a loose DTL.

High-Capacity Power: Powered by an 800mAh battery with USB-C fast charging.

5% (50mg) Nicotine Strength: Delivers a satisfying, smooth throat hit with every puff.

name: Cali Bars 20K Disposable Vape (2,000 Puffs)
description:
Pure Simplicity with Cali Bars 2K The Cali Bars 2K is a cult favorite known for its sleek, "stick-style" design and ultra-reliable performance. Perfect for vapers who want a consistent, pocket-friendly device without the need for charging or complicated screens, it delivers the signature "California Grown" flavor experience in a compact form.

Reliable Daily Performance
Designed for ease of use, the Cali Bars 2K is ready to go right out of the box:

2,000 Puffs: A high-capacity reservoir and optimized battery provide roughly 2,000 smooth hits.

Compact "Stick" Design: Slim enough to fit in any pocket or small bag, making it the ideal travel companion.

No Maintenance Required: No charging ports, no buttons, and no refills—simply vape and dispose of when finished.

Key Features
Puff Count: Approximately 2,000 Puffs.

E-Liquid Capacity: 5ml of premium nicotine salt.

Nicotine Strength: 5% (50mg) for a strong, satisfying hit.

Battery: Integrated pre-charged battery designed to last the full duration of the e-liquid.

Coil: Quality mesh/wire coil for instant vapor production.

Best-Selling Flavors
Blue Razz: A sweet and tart blue raspberry classic.

Watermelon Ice: Juicy watermelon with a refreshing menthol finish.

Strawberry Ice: Sweet vine-ripened strawberries with a cool exhale.

Sweet Mint: A crisp, clean, and icy mint flavor.

name: RAW Rolling Papers
description:
Product Overview
Brand: RAW.

Series: Classic.

Material: Made from natural, unrefined plant fibers.

Appearance: These papers are translucent and light brown because they are unbleached and contain no added chalk or dyes.

Sizes Pictured
The images display two distinct sizes to accommodate different rolling preferences:

Single Wide: A standard, cigarette-sized paper ideal for shorter, personal sessions.

1¼ Size: A slightly larger and wider paper (approximately 25% larger than Single Wide), which is the most popular standard for everyday use.

Key Technical Features
Authenticity Guaranteed: Each pack features a circular "Authentic Purest Natural Fibers" seal, certifying that the product is unrefined.

Proprietary Watermark: Although not visible on the packaging, these papers use a patented criss-cross watermark designed to prevent "runs" and ensure a slow, even burn.

Natural Adhesive: The papers utilize a natural Acacia gum line for a secure, chemical-free seal.

Origin: The packaging indicates these are "Made in Spain," the birthplace of modern rolling paper.

name: RAW Pre-Rolled Paper
description:
Product Overview
Brand: RAW.

Series: Classic.

Material: 100% unbleached and unrefined plant fibers, such as flax and hemp.

Appearance: Translucent light brown color, as no chlorine bleach or whitening agents are used in the process.

Specific Sizes Shown
Based on the packaging in your photos, two standard sizes are featured:

Single Wide: Standard cigarette-sized papers (70mm x 37mm).

1¼ Size: The original 'Spanish Size' (76mm x 44mm or 78mm depending on specific regional standard), which holds approximately 25% more than single wide.

Key Technical Features
Patented Criss-Cross Watermark: Each leaf is watermarked with a grid pattern that helps prevent 'runs' (uneven burning) and ensures a smooth, slow, and consistent burn.

Natural Gum Line: Uses purely natural, organic Acacia gum harvested from Acacia trees.

Eco-Friendly Manufacturing: The papers are made in Alcoy, Spain—the birthplace of rolling papers—using an environmentally friendly process.

Vegan-Friendly: RAW papers contain no animal products, synthetic additives, chalk, or dyes.

Why It's Popular
RAW Classic is designed for connoisseurs who want a 'clean' smoke. Because the paper is unrefined and ultra-thin, it provides a neutral flavor that allows the natural taste of your herbs or tobacco to stand out without the chemical aftertaste found in bleached white papers.

name: RAW Smoking Tip
description:
Product Varieties Pictured
The provided photos highlight different formats for various rolling needs:

RAW Classic Single Wide: A standard, cigarette-sized paper designed for personal use.

RAW Classic 1¼ Size: Often called 'Spanish Size,' this is the most popular standard for everyday rolling, holding roughly 25% more than the Single Wide.

RAW Classic Cones: Pre-rolled translucent papers with a built-in tip, designed for those who prefer to 'fill' rather than 'roll'.

RAW Natural Unrefined Tips: Small booklets of stiff, chlorine-free paper used to create a 'crutch' or filter at the end of a roll for better airflow and stability.

Key Technical Features
Authenticity: Every pack features the 'Purest Natural Fibers' circular seal, certifying that the product is authentic and unrefined.

Proprietary Watermark: The papers feature a patented Criss-Cross watermark. This grid pattern ensures a slow, even burn and prevents 'runs' from ruining the session.

Natural Adhesive: RAW uses a pure, natural Acacia gum line for a secure and chemical-free seal.

Heritage: The packaging notes that these products are Made in Spain, specifically in Alcoy, which is historically recognized as the birthplace of rolling papers.

Environmental & Quality Standards
These products are highly regarded by connoisseurs because they are:

Vegan-friendly and non-GMO.

Free from added chalk, dyes, or burn-enhancing chemicals.

Designed to provide a neutral taste that does not interfere with the natural flavor of the material being smoked.

name: Dura cell
description:
The design is a high-energy, tripartite promotional graphic featuring various vaping devices. It uses a consistent, atmospheric layout across three distinct color-coded panels—Gold, Silver/Greyscale, and Electric Blue—to showcase product versatility and power.

Design Elements
Typography & Branding: The logo 'ENBVAPES' is positioned at the top of each panel in a bold, metallic sans-serif font. A stylized 'V' creates a sharp, lightning-bolt effect that integrates with the background electricity.

Central Imagery: Each section features a pair of devices: a larger, high-performance Box Mod with a digital display and an adjustable tank, paired with a sleek, portable Pod System.

Visual Effects:

Lightning & Electricity: Powerful bolts of energy radiate from behind the devices, suggesting high performance and battery power.

Atmospheric Smoke: Wisps of thick vapor surround the base of the devices and fill the background, emphasizing the product's primary function.

Reflective Surface: The products are placed on a glossy, wet-look floor that mirrors the light and color of each specific panel.

name: Premium USB-A to Lightning Charging Cable
description:
Reliable, fast, and built to last — this premium USB-A to Lightning charging cable is designed for everyday use. Reinforced strain relief and a thick, tangle-resistant jacket protect the inner conductors for long life. Ideal for charging iPhone and iPad devices or syncing data with your computer.

Key Features
- Fast Charging Support: Optimized copper conductors for consistent power delivery.
- Durable Build: Reinforced stress points rated for thousands of bends.
- Tangle-Resistant Jacket: Smooth outer sheath to reduce knots in bags or pockets.
- Universal USB-A to Lightning: Works with power banks, wall adapters, car chargers, and laptops.

Included In Box
- 1x USB-A to Lightning Cable

name: Premium USB-C to Lightning Charging Cable
description:
Reliable, fast, and built to last — this premium USB-C to Lightning charging cable is designed for everyday use. Reinforced strain relief and a thick, tangle-resistant jacket protect the inner conductors for long life. Ideal for charging iPhone and iPad devices from USB‑C power sources or syncing data with your computer.

Key Features
- Fast Charging Support: Optimized copper conductors for consistent power delivery.
- Durable Build: Reinforced stress points rated for thousands of bends.
- Tangle-Resistant Jacket: Smooth outer sheath to reduce knots in bags or pockets.
- Universal USB‑C to Lightning: Works with USB‑C wall adapters, power banks, car chargers, and laptops.

Included In Box
- 1x USB‑C to Lightning Cable

name: ELFBAR BC5000 | Rechargeable Disposable Vape (5,000 Puffs)
description:
The ELFBAR BC5000 is a compact, flagon-shaped disposable vape designed for portability and a high-quality user experience. It is well-known for its dual coil technology, which ensures pure, rich flavors and consistent hits from the first puff to the very last. With its massive 13mL pre-filled e-liquid reservoir and rechargeable battery, it offers a long-lasting vaping session that can last up to two weeks for casual users.

Key Features
Massive Puff Count: Delivers approximately 5,000 puffs per device.

Rechargeable Battery: Features a built-in 650mAh battery that is rechargeable via a USB-C port.

Dual Mesh Coil: Utilizes an advanced dual coil system to provide outstanding flavor and vapor production.

Compact Design: Small enough to fit comfortably in your palm or pocket, measuring roughly 79mm x 41mm x 19mm.

Draw-Activated: No buttons are required; simply take a puff to activate the device.

Nicotine Strength: Typically contains 5% (50mg/mL) nicotine salts, though 0% and 3% options are also available.

name: Hayati Pro Max 4000 | Premium Crystal Disposable Vape
description:
The Hayati Pro Max 4000 is a sophisticated, non-rechargeable disposable vape designed to deliver a consistent and flavorful mouth-to-lung (MTL) experience. It stands out with its signature crystal-clear outer shell and vibrant inner colors, giving it a modern, high-end look. Engineered with advanced Dual Mesh Coil technology, it provides a smoother draw and more intense flavor compared to standard single-coil disposables. With a massive 1400mAh built-in battery, it is designed to last until the very last drop of its 10mL e-liquid reservoir.

Key Features
Massive Puff Capacity: Delivers up to 4,000+ puffs, making it ideal for multi-day use without needing a replacement.

Dual Mesh Coil (1.1 Ω): Enhances vapor production and ensures flavor consistency from the first puff to the last.

Large Battery: Equipped with a powerful 1400mAh pre-charged battery (non-rechargeable), providing enough power to outlast many other disposables in its class.

Draw-Activated: No buttons or settings; simply inhale to activate the 'crystal' LED at the bottom and begin vaping.

Compact & Durable: Despite its high capacity, it remains pocket-friendly and features a leak-proof design.

name: Elfbar Ultra 5000
description: Elfbar Ultra 5000 is a compact, long-lasting rechargeable disposable designed for clean, satisfying flavor in a pocket‑friendly form. Built with upgraded mesh coil technology and high‑grade wicking, it delivers consistent performance from first puff to last. The ergonomic flagon-style shell sits comfortably in the hand while the draw‑activated system keeps usage simple and reliable.
